Question 38
A benchtop dc power supply acts as an ideal 4 A current source as long as its terminal voltage is below 
10 V. Beyond this point, it begins to behave as an ideal 10 V voltage source for all load currents going 
down to 0 A, When connected to an ideal rheostat, find the load resistance value at which maximum power 
is transferred and the corresponding load voltage and current.
(A) 
2.5
, 4 A, 10 V

 
(B) 
Short,
A, 10 V

 
(C) 
2.5 , 4 A, 5 V

 
(D) 
Open, 4 A, 0 V
 
(A)
